SDK-19879 - Spark DropDownList control with custom TileLayout skin is incorrectly sized and doesnt show all items first time dropdown is opened

Changed the sizing logic in PopUpAnchor so that we only explicitly set the width or height if the respective autoSizePopUpWidth or autoSizePopUpHeight properties are set to true. When either width or height aren’t explicitly set, the popUp will automatically resize that dimension if the measured size has changed.
Added a new spark.core.RelativePosition enum class for the PopUpAnchor.popUpPosition property. Possible values include “left”, “right”, “above”, “below”, “center” and “exact”.

SDK-20821 - DropDownList does not position dropDown to the left of anchor button when needed
Made some improvements to the PopUpAnchor positioning logic. It now uses the following algorithm:
- If the popUp does not fit on the screen, then reverse the popUpPosition (ex. below -> above, left-> right)
- If the popUp still does not fit on the screen, then go back to the original popUpPosition
- Adjust the position in the horizontal and vertical directions enough for the popUp to fit on the screen
The positioning logic does not handle rotation, but it does handle scale.
Added a protected function positionPopUp whose default implementation performs the above logic. Subclasses can override this to perform their own positioning algorithm.
Moved the CompoundTransform.decomposeMatrix function into the MatrixUtil class.

SDK-20892 - Using navigation keys don't work when the DropDownList is closed

The dataGroup skin part holds the layout value. The layout was null when the DropDownList was closed because the dataGroup only exists when the DropDownList is open. The fix is to override the layout getter and return VerticalLayout if the dataGroup doesn't exist.
SDK-20850 - DropDownList dispatches open event before dropDown is visible on screen
The skin update was changed from synchronous to asynchronous, so the open event was dispatched too early. We now wait for UPDATE_COMPLETE before sending the open or close events.
SDK-19874 - Setting selectedIndex on Spark DropDownList control doesnt auto-scroll dropdown
The skin update was changed from synchronous to asynchronous, so the dataGroup skin part didn't exist when we tried to auto-scroll. We now wait for UPDATE_COMPLETE before auto-scrolling.
SDK-20810 - DropDownList does not display color style correctly when set to white

The labelElement was getting colorized to the baseColor. The DropDownListSkin has been changed to subclass Skin instead of SparkSkin. There are no visuals in the DropDownListSkin that need any of the SparkSkin functionality.
SDK-20870 - Changing Spark DropDownList skin at runtime clears the DropDownList Button label
In partAdded, when the labelElement is added, we now update the labelElement with the selectedItem's text representation
